June 3, 2018 D Luzerner Kantonal-Musiktag
Luzerner Kantonal-Musiktag 0 March Contest
luzerner-kantonal-musiktag
Seetalstrasse, Eschenbach, LU, Switzerland > held on June 2nd & 3rd
52 Bands competed (mixed Draw - sep. Ranking CS-3rd & Brass/Wind; Draws from 35 played on Sun)
[Own Choices, in Vortragslokal Neuheim: 52 Bands competed, not ranked but Expertise by Thomas Wyss, Toni Scholl, Frédéric Théodoloz]
March 21, 2015, 1:19 p.m. May 27, 2020, 8:49 a.m.
